channel.title: Got a problem
channel.description:
Hello,
Well, i have made a Server, it is running. But all players, connect on my ip.
if i do ::ipban blabi get all ipbanned. if i do ::ipmute blabu all get muted, even if you create a new account.
Well how to fix it? Is there any way?

item.title: Got a problem
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

Hello,

Well, i have made a Server, it is running.
But all players, connect on my ip.

if i do ::ipban blabi get all ipbanned.
if i do ::ipmute blabu all get muted, even if you create a new account.

Well how to fix it? Is there any way?

Read full topic
